title: Ep. 315 - Why The Shooter Did It
description:
A killer goes on a shooting spree at a New Zealand mosque. Why did he do it? We will analyze his manifesto as well as underreported religious violence around the globe. Then, Nancy Pelosi wants kids to vote, Beto raises a pile of cash, and I defend Chelsea Clinton. Date: 03-18-2019
